example_sentences.example_en: I am going to eat rice.

example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de manger de la soupe.

example_sentences.example_en: You are going to buy shoes.
They have just bought a house.
She used to see her friends.
I am going to see the results.
They have just seen the answer.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de voir la réponse.

example_sentences.example_en: You are going to hear a story.
They have just heard the song.
I am going to bring dessert.
You are going to choose a color.
They have just chosen a restaurant.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de choisir un restaurant.

example_sentences.example_en: I am going to read the news.
They have just read the book.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de lire le livre.

example_sentences.example_en: I am going to write a report.
They have just written the answers.
He will play a new song.
I am going to play a match.
They have just played a game.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de jouer une partie.
Elle a travaillé dans un bureau.

example_sentences.example_en: He will work on the project.
I am going to work overtime.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je vais travailler des heures supplémentaires.

example_sentences.example_en: They have just worked out a solution.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de trouver une solution.

example_sentences.example_en: We used to help each other.
He will help with the homework.
I am going to help you.
They have just helped the community.
We used to ask for directions.
I am going to ask a favor.
They have just asked a question.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de poser une question.
Elle a répondu à la question.

example_sentences.example_en: I am going to answer your question.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je vais répondre à ta question.

example_sentences.example_en: They have just answered the survey.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de répondre au sondage.

example_sentences.example_en: I am going to wait for my friend.
They have just waited for the results.
We used to understand each other.
I am going to understand the instructions.
They have just understood the rules.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de comprendre les règles.

example_sentences.example_en: I learn something new every day.
example_sentences.example_fr: J'apprends quelque chose de nouveau chaque jour.

example_sentences.example_en: I am going to learn French.
They have just learned the news.
She found a dollar on the street.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle a trouvé un dollar dans la rue.

example_sentences.example_en: I am going to find a good restaurant.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je vais trouver un bon restaurant.

example_sentences.example_en: They have just found their way.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de trouver leur chemin.

example_sentences.example_en: We used to lose track of time.
example_sentences.example_fr: Nous perdions la notion du temps.

example_sentences.example_en: I am going to lose weight.
They have just lost their keys.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de perdre leurs clés.

example_sentences.example_en: We used to open the shop.
I am going to open a bottle.
They have just opened the gift.
We used to close the store.
I am going to close the file.
They have just closed the meeting.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de fermer la réunion.

example_sentences.example_en: We used to travel by train.
I am going to travel this summer.

example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de voyager à l'étranger.

example_sentences.example_en: We used to return home late.
I am going to return the call.
They have just returned from vacation.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de rentrer de vacances.

example_sentences.example_en: We used to explain things in detail.
example_sentences.example_fr: Nous expliquions les choses en détail.

example_sentences.example_en: I am going to explain my project.
They have just explained the process.
We used to describe our vacations.
I am going to describe my day.
They have just described the problem.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de décrire le problème.
Je construis un château de sable.
Elle a construit une cabane dans un arbre.

example_sentences.example_en: I am going to build a website.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je vais construire un site web.

example_sentences.example_en: They have just built a new bridge.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de construire un nouveau pont.

example_sentences.example_en: We used to destroy our mistakes.
He will destroy the old building.
I am going to destroy this box.
They have just destroyed the old bridge.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de détruire l'ancien pont.

example_sentences.example_en: I allow my children to play outside.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je permets à mes enfants de jouer dehors.

example_sentences.example_en: She allowed her dog to bark.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle a permis à son chien d'aboyer.

example_sentences.example_en: We used to allow extra time for this task.
example_sentences.example_fr: Nous permettions du temps supplémentaire pour cette tâche.

example_sentences.example_en: He will allow us to leave early.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il nous permettra de partir tôt.

example_sentences.example_en: I am going to allow more flexibility.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je vais permettre plus de flexibilité.

example_sentences.example_en: They have just allowed the changes.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de permettre les changements.

example_sentences.example_en: He will prefer the red dress.
I am going to prefer this option.
They have just preferred the other movie.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de préférer l'autre film.

example_sentences.example_en: I invite you to my party.
We used to invite them over.
I am going to invite you to dinner.
They have just invited us to the wedding.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de nous inviter au mariage.
Elle a salué tout le monde chaleureusement.

example_sentences.example_en: We used to greet each other with a kiss.
example_sentences.example_fr: Nous nous saluions avec un bisou.

example_sentences.example_en: He will greet the guests at the door.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il saluera les invités à la porte.

example_sentences.example_en: I am going to greet my friend.
They have just greeted the new neighbors.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de saluer les nouveaux voisins.

example_sentences.example_en: I wish you a happy birthday.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je te souhaite un joyeux anniversaire.
Elle a souhaité une bonne santé.

example_sentences.example_en: We used to wish each other well.
I am going to wish him luck.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je vais lui souhaiter bonne chance.

example_sentences.example_en: They have just wished her well.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de lui souhaiter du bien.

example_sentences.example_en: I am going to send the invitation.
They have just sent the documents.
We used to clean every Saturday.
I am going to clean the bathroom.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je vais nettoyer la salle de bain.

example_sentences.example_en: They have just cleaned the house.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de nettoyer la maison.

example_sentences.example_en: We used to send back the forms.
He will send back the book.
I am going to send back the shoes.
They have just sent back the documents.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils viennent de renvoyer les documents.
